COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: [Chris] “Let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah... I said hold on a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: I was all prepared, waiting by the front door for Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e
STRING: Phorni had been staring out the window, unaware that
I'd be ready to leave in such a short time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x172
STRING: She slid across the floor as far as she could, and
skittered the rest of the way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x188
STRING: I scooped her up and headed outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b6
STRING: The morning air felt great, and the misty rain wasn't
unpleasant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc
STRING: The cold wasn't piercing, and once you got used to the
rain, this city could actually be nice to live in.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2
STRING: Otherwise, the nobility wouldn't have come to like this
place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20a
STRING: [Phorni] “Aren't you full of energy today... Are you finally
going to get down to practice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: [Chris] “...Who knows? If I find someone to practice
with, maybe, but if not, how about us?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x266
STRING: [Phorni] “Don't say such things before looking.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x290
STRING: Phorni sounded angry, but she was enjoying it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2a6
STRING: Not counting the city, the school was certainly the first
place that Phorni had seen two days in a row.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2bc
STRING: Phorni was having so much fun, it looked like she'd
forgotten why she was there in the first place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c8
STRING: I was glad too, because things were easier that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d4
STRING: If only we could perform an ensemble of that song
again, just like yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x306
STRING: [Phorni] “What's with the grin?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x31c
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? What grin?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e
STRING: [Phorni] “Like when you're reading a letter from Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: [Chris] “...I wasn't grinning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x396
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm watching you all the time, so I can't be
wrong.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ac
STRING: She sounded confident, and without any concern for
what I had to say, she returned to being captivated by
the scenery.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c2
STRING: She seemed so happy, if only I'd brought her out more
often.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3e4
STRING: Also, about Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: In the three years of living alone in the city, there
probably wasn't enough room in my mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: I was a pathetic human being for not noticing earlier,
and as if to set things right, I was determined to make
the most of our time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c0
STRING: [Cordell] “What an improvement. I can't believe you
only started practicing yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4e0
STRING: [Chris] “I've been practicing at home as well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fe
STRING: [Cordell] “You must have a lot of spare time on your
hands.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x514
STRING: [Chris] “That's not the reason; playing this song is what I
find most enjoyable now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x550
STRING: [Cordell] “Enjoyment is a good thing, but don't forget
your task. In any case, I wouldn't worry about the song
or your Fortelle playing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ac
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris. You're looking a little well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c2
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e0
STRING: [Cordell] “It was a compliment. Try looking more
pleased.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: [Chris] “I don't see how 'looking a little well' can be
taken as a compliment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x632
STRING: [Cordell] “Suit yourself. I've set the deadline for next
Friday. If you haven't found a partner by then, that is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x65c
STRING: [Chris] “Got it, I'll be counting on you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, someone sounds confident.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: [Chris] “...Uh, no, that's not what I meant...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ba
STRING: I'd said that because I really was counting on Ms.
Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c6
STRING: But she'd taken it the wrong way, apparently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6d2
STRING: Correcting her would've just led to more trouble, so I
remained silent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x704
STRING: [Cordell] “Continue practicing until then, as usual. Don't
be late next week.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x71a
STRING: [Chris] “Got it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73c
STRING: I packed up my Fortelle, then placed Phorni on my
shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x748
STRING: I wasn't able to talk to Phorni during practice, but I was
playing her song, and today she'd sung along happily
too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x790
STRING: [Phorni] “No problem!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a6
STRING: I whispered so that Ms. Cordell wouldn't hear, but
Phorni's answer was full of gusto.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ca
STRING: Tomorrow is Saturday... I wonder if we'll spend the
whole day on ensembles for this song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e0
STRING: Last Saturday, we'd finished the lyrics in one day, and if
we finished the song tomorrow, wouldn't everything be
done?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x800
STRING: I couldn't quite imagine what'd happen after that, but in
any case, time passed inexorably.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x816
STRING: Whether this path I'd chosen was the best one, no one
could know .

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x82c
STRING: In the distant future...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: Only when I had the capacity to reflect on the past, I'd
know, for the first time if I'd been correct today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: But I didn't think that my future self would have any
regrets.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b2
STRING: I finished my meal with Torta, then headed to the
practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8da
STRING: [Phorni] “Is it Fal today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f0
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. She said she's always in the last practice
room down this hallway. Even if it wasn't open, she'd
find the next closest one, so it shouldn't be too hard to
find her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x936
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm. It'd be great if you did some real
practicing today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94c
STRING: [Chris] “...I know, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x970
STRING: At a leisurely pace, I walked down the hallway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x97c
STRING: And then...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: The door to the intended practice room was open, and
I found the expected occupant inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c6
STRING: [Fal] “Oh? It's you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9dc
STRING: [Chris] “Good afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0e
STRING: [Fal] “Are you going to practice here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: [Chris] “Yes... Well. I'd thought of going over there, but I
guess you're done for the day?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa60
STRING: [Fal] “Huh? You don't mean... With me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa76
STRING: [Chris] “It's been some time, but I thought we could...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab2
STRING: [Fal] “I'm sorry. The only days when I can practice in the
afternoon are Tuesday and Thursday... Didn't I tell you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad2
STRING: [Chris] “...Now that you mention it, yes, I think you did.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb04
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, you sneaky...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb44
STRING: [Fal] “But, although today's not possible, I'm okay with
tomorrow or the day after if you're free?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb64
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... That's okay. There's no need to come in on
the weekend...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba0
STRING: [Fal] “...I see. Then what about Tuesday?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb6
STRING: [Chris] “That's not for a while, so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe8
STRING: [Fal] “...Right. In that case, I'll wait for you to decide.
Though there isn't much time left.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc08
STRING: [Chris] “Uh... Yeah. I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3a
STRING: [Fal] “It's fine. I'll see you around, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc50
STRING: [Chris] “Okay. Sorry if I said anything strange.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: [Fal] “Please, don't worry about it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcac
STRING: With that, Fal left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb8
STRING: Unseen to Fal, Phorni pulled my ear even before the
former had disappeared from sight.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcea
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, Chris. What are you playing at?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd00
STRING: [Chris] “...She has something to attend to today,
apparently.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd32
STRING: [Phorni] “Did you forget something so important?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd48
STRING: [Chris] “...More or less.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7a
STRING: [Phorni] “＊sigh＊ Then you could've agreed to practice
today or tomorrow, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9a
STRING: [Chris] “It's not like I've chosen her yet, so wasting the
weekend like that would be, you know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd6
STRING: [Phorni] “That's not something you're in a position to
say. What's worse, she was the one who offered, and
you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe12
STRING: [Phorni] “She'll assume that you're not interested, so she
won't make that same offer again, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe32
STRING: [Chris] “But it wouldn't be right to practice the whole
weekend and then realize it wouldn't work out, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5a
STRING: [Phorni] “...Well, what are you gonna do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe70
STRING: [Chris] “Nothing to be done about today, so how about
an ensemble? I happened to see some empty practice
rooms earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeac
STRING: [Phorni] “...Hmph.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec2
STRING: [Chris] “What's wrong?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef4
STRING: [Phorni] “Where is your sense of urgency?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0a
STRING: [Chris] “I-I got it, let's just find a practice room first.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2e
STRING: The first and second year students were having lectures,
so the hallways were empty.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf44
STRING: But that didn't mean there weren't third year students
practicing at this time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5a
STRING: I didn't want anyone to see me apologizing to my
shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf70
STRING: With one ear pulled, I entered an empty practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa4
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd6
STRING: [Phorni] “First, are you serious about looking for a
partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfec
STRING: [Chris] “...Not really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101e
STRING: [Phorni] “What?!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1034
STRING: [Chris] “Do you remember what I said to Ms. Cordell? 'If
the time comes'?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105c
STRING: [Phorni] “...Were you serious about that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1072
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. Recently that's all I've been thinking about.
Torta... I couldn't pair up with her, was my first thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ae
STRING: [Phorni] “...Why not?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c4
STRING: [Chris] “Because of Arie. If Torta and I were partners,
Arie would get worried.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ec
STRING: [Phorni] “But didn't she say in her letter that she'd feel
more comfortable if you paired up with Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110c
STRING: [Chris] “Still, she and I are too close... Torta has become
a given... More so than Arie, even...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1152
STRING: [Phorni] “I think failing your graduation recital and
having to stay another year would be worse, but...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Chris] “I'll try not to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a4
STRING: [Phorni] “Then what about Fal? Or Lise?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ba
STRING: [Chris] “Fal is... You saw it earlier, she's too good of a
person. Too good for me. And as for Lise, I'm scared of
getting too involved.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1200
STRING: [Phorni] “...What do you mean, scared?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1216
STRING: [Chris] “She's like a young Arie. And for that very reason,
she shouldn't be with me. Also she's a first year, so she
doesn't need to pair up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1248
STRING: [Phorni] “Why are you avoiding other people?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x125e
STRING: [Chris] “Because... I'd be happy with Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: [Phorni] “Then why aren't you serious about looking?
That way you'll...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a6
STRING: [Chris] “You already heard why. I don't want to get too
involved with others.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e2
STRING: [Phorni] “And so you pick me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f8
STRING: [Chris] “No, you're a separate issue, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1318
STRING: [Chris] “If I'm undecided by next Friday, Ms. Cordell will
introduce someone. That means I'm free to use my time
however I want to until then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1342
STRING: [Phorni] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1358
STRING: [Chris] “That's why I wanted to perform ensembles with
you during that time. That's all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: [Phorni] “...Why would you say that, all of a sudden...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1396
STRING: [Chris] “I've said so much already, I might as well be
completely honest. I had a dream... A dream about
losing someone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b6
STRING: [Chris] “Someone important... In the dream, that person
was walking away from me, so I tried to say their name.
But it just wouldn't come out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e0
STRING: [Chris] “It was just a dream. But soon after, I saw you,
Phorni, and I put the two together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: I went on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140c
STRING: [Chris] “...What are you going to do after I graduate,
Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1434
STRING: [Phorni] “No questions. We're talking about you now,
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1454
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, we are talking about me. But you and I are
not unrelated, unlike other people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147c
STRING: [Phorni] “I'll... I'll stay here, in this city.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1492
STRING: [Chris] “What does that mean? No one else knows you
exist, Phorni. Are you going to stay in that room by
yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d8
STRING: [Phorni] “That's the plan. That room always gets
students from this school, so someone else on the same
wavelength as me is bound to appear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, there may be someone like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1534
STRING: [Phorni] “And yet...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154a
STRING: [Chris] “If I said ‘Come with me,’ what would you do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1586
STRING: [Phorni] “...No way. I couldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x159c
STRING: I thought that might be the case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a8
STRING: Perhaps that dream did foreshadow my parting ways
with Phorni after all...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15be
STRING: Something my unconscious mind had intuited, and
presented to me as a dream.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15d4
STRING: But... Was that all there was to it?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e0
STRING: [Chris] “If it's not possible... Then I want to make the
most of the time we have now. I'll finish the song and
perform it... That'll be an important memory.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1626
STRING: [Phorni] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x163c
STRING: That short answer was all Phorni had to say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1648
STRING: But I felt that it contained acceptance, kindness, and
even love.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x165e
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: I thanked her, meaninglessly, and began setting up my
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1698
STRING: There was barely a week left, and I was only going to
think of Phorni that whole time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ae
STRING: I'm sure Arietta would understand too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ba
STRING: Not a lover, nor a friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c6
STRING: Something just like family, might be the best
description.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16dc
STRING: What was best for Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e8
STRING: That is, performing ensembles together, and nothing
more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fe
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1726
STRING: [Phorni] “Well then, let's begin. You don't have much
time left, and you want to finish this, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: I was glad just to hear Phorni sound so happy saying
that.
